data.name: BonusIssuedEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "BonusIssued", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Bonus Issued", "Subject": "Woohoo! Your {{model.BrandName}} bonus is issued", "MessageContent": "

Woohoo! The bonus {bonus name} is now issued in your account!

Here are the details:
Bonus Code: {{model.BonusCode}}
Bonus Amount: {{model.BonusAmount}}
Bonus Description: {{model.BonusDescription}}

Please note that there are Terms and Conditions, some of them may seem harsh and that is because we want to make sure that we spend enough time together!

Now it’s over to you, have fun!

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: BonusIssuedSms
BonusWageringRequirementEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "BonusWageringRequirement", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Bonus Wagering Requirement Default", "Subject": "Bonus wagering information", "MessageContent": "

Hello {{model.Username}},

Your bonus has been activated. Bet {{model.RequiredWagerAmount}} to earn your {{model.BonusAmount}} bonus.

Click here to continue playing.

" }

data.name: BonusWageringRequirementFulfilledEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "BonusWageringRequirementFulfilled", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Bonus Wagering Requirement Fulfilled", "Subject": "Woohoo! You have fulfilled the wagering requirements for the {{model.BonusName}}", "MessageContent": "

Well done you! You have fulfilled the wagering requirements for the {{model.BonusName}} and we are very proud of you!

Here are the details:
Bonus Code: {{model.BonusCode}}
Bonus Amount: {{model.Amount}}
Bonus Description: {{model.BonusDescription}}

Enjoy it!

Cheers,

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: BonusWageringRequirementFulfilledSms
BonusWageringRequirementSms
ContactVerificationEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "ContactVerification", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Contact Verification Default", "Subject": "Contact Verification", "MessageContent": "

\n\tHello {{model.Username}},\n

\n

\n\tTo verify your email address, please click the following link: {{model.VerificationUrl}}\n

" }

data.name: ContactVerificationSms
FirstOnlineDepositSuccessfulEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "FirstOnlineDepositSuccessful", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "First Online Deposit Successful", "Subject": "Congratulations on your {{model.BrandName}} first time deposit", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

Nice work! You just made your first time deposit, we are very proud of you.

Here are the details:
Reference code: {{model.ReferenceCode}}
Deposit amount: {{model.Amount}}

Place your first bet now and get the fun started.

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: FirstOnlineDepositSuccessfulSms
ForgotPasswordEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "ForgotPassword", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Forgot Password", "Subject": "Reset your {{model.BrandName}} password", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

Can’t remember your password, huh? Don’t worry Bro! We are always here to back you up.

To reset the password, click the link below:

Reset Now

This link will expire in {{model.ResetPasswordUrlExpiry}} hours after this email was sent.

If you didn’t ask to reset password, feel free to ignore this email and keep on winning.

Cheers,

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: ForgotPasswordSms
HighDepositReminderEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "HighDepositReminder", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "High Deposit Reminder Default", "Subject": "Deposit Reminder", "MessageContent": "

\n\tHello {{model.Username}},\n

\n

\n\tYou are about to get {{model.BonusAmount}} by depositing {{model.RemainingAmount}} more to reach monthly deposit of {{model.DepositAmountRequired}} bonus\n

" }

data.name: HighDepositReminderSms
NewPasswordEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "NewPassword", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "New Password Default", "Subject": "New Password", "MessageContent": "

\n\tHello {{model.Username}},\n

\n

\n\tYour new password is {{model.NewPassword}}\n

" }

data.name: NewPasswordSms
OfflineDepositPendingEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "OfflineDepositPending", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Offline Deposit Pending", "Subject": "{{model.BrandName}} Pending offline deposit", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

Thanks for making the deposit. Unfortunately we have difficulties to verify your deposit and have to put the request on hold. Your reference code is {{model.ReferenceCode}}. Our customer service will contact you within 24 hours.

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: OfflineDepositPendingSms
OfflineDepositRejectedEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "OfflineDepositRejected", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Offline Deposit Rejected", "Subject": "{{model.BrandName}} Fail transaction for your offline deposit", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

Thanks for making the deposit. Unfortunately we have difficulties to verify your deposit and have to reject your offline deposit request. Your reference code is {{model.ReferenceCode}}. Our customer service will contact you within 24 hours.

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: OfflineDepositRejectedSms
OfflineDepositRequestedEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "OfflineDepositRequested", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Offline Deposit Requested", "Subject": "{{model.BrandName}} Offline deposit information", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

We have received your offline deposit request. Please see the bank details below,

Bank Name: {{model.BankName}}
Bank Account Name: {{model.BankAccountName}}
Bank Account number: {{model.BankAccountNumber}}

{% if model.RecommendedBanks.length > 1 %}

Please deposit your funds as soon as you can. Deposit of funds from the following banks will make the approvals faster:

    {% for bank in model.RecommendedBanks %}
  • {{ bank }}
    • {% endfor %}

{% endif %}

After the deposit, please go to Deposit History page and submit the required documents and we will process your request as soon as possible once you receive your documents.

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: OfflineDepositRequestedSms
OfflineDepositSuccessfulEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "OfflineDepositSuccessful", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Offline Deposit Successful", "Subject": "{{model.BrandName}} offline deposit is successful", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

Nice work! We have received your deposit: {{model.Amount}}.

Keep calm and win big! (Game icons)

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: OfflineDepositSuccessfulSms
OnlineDepositSuccessfulEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "OnlineDepositSuccessful", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Online Deposit Successful", "Subject": "Congratulations on your {{model.BrandName}} deposit", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

Nice work! You just made your deposit, we are very proud of you.

Here are the details:
Reference code: {{model.ReferenceCode}}
Deposit amount: {{model.Amount}}

Keep calm and win big!

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: OnlineDepositSuccessfulSms
OnlineDepositUnsuccessfulEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "OnlineDepositUnsuccessful", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Online Deposit Unsuccessful", "Subject": "Your {{model.BrandName} deposit didn’t go through", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

We are sorry to inform you that your deposit {$Amount} didn’t go through.

Please contact our Customer service for further assistance.

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: OnlineDepositUnsuccessfulSms
PermanentSelfExclusionEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "PermanentSelfExclusion", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Permanent Self Exclusion", "Subject": "Your {{model.BrandName}} Self-Exclusion request", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

This is an acknowledgement of your Self-Exclusion request, your account will remain permanently closed. You will no longer be able to hold an active account with us. Please refrain from opening any further accounts in the future.

Sorry to see you are leaving us but we wish you the best of luck with your future endeavours.

Cheers,

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: PermanentSelfExclusionSms
PlayerBankAccountApprovedEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "PlayerBankAccountApproved", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Player Bank Account Approved", "Subject": "{{model.BrandName}} Your bank info is verified", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

Wanted to give you an update that your bank info is verified. Hooray!!

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: PlayerBankAccountApprovedSms
PlayerBankAccountRejectedEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "PlayerBankAccountRejected", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Player Bank Account Rejected", "Subject": "{{model.BrandName}} We can't verify your bank info", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

We wanted to let you know that we have trouble verifying your bank info. Please submit your correct bank info again.

Feel free to call our Customer Support, we are always here to help!

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: PlayerBankAccountRejectedSms
PlayerRegisteredEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "PlayerRegistered", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Player Registered", "Subject": "Welcome to {{model.BrandName}}", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.Username}}

You are now part of the {{model.BrandName}} family, we are so happy to have you with us.

To give you a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience we will keep you updated from time to time with our promotions and offers.

Your username is: {{model.Username}}

Please keep this safe as you will need this every time you login.

Thanks for joining {{model.BrandName}} and we wish you the best of luck backing a winner.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: PlayerRegisteredSms
ReferFriendsEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "ReferFriends", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Refer Friends Default", "Subject": "Your friend has sent you a referral", "MessageContent": "

\n\tHello,\n

\n

\n\tYour friend {{model.Referrer}} has sent you a referral to {{model.BrandName}}. Click here\n

", }

ResetPasswordEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "ResetPassword", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Reset Password", "Subject": "Your {{model.BrandName}} password has been reset", "MessageContent": "

If you didn’t make this change, please contact our Customer Support.

data.value:
{ "MessageType": "TemporarySelfExclusion", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Temporary Self Exclusion", "Subject": "Your {{model.BrandName}} Self-Exclusion request", "MessageContent": "

WithdrawalRequestDeclinedEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "WithdrawalRequestDeclined", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Withdrawal Request Declined", "Subject": "{{model.BrandName}} Withdrawal request {{model.ReferenceCode}} : Failed", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

We wanted to let you know that we have trouble processing your withdrawal request {{model.ReferenceCode}}. Please call our Customer Support if you have any questions, we are always here to help!

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: WithdrawalRequestDeclinedSms
WithdrawalRequestedEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "WithdrawalRequested", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Withdrawal Requested", "Subject": "{{model.BrandName}} Withdrawal request {{model.ReferenceCode}}", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

We have received your withdrawal request {{model.ReferenceCode}} and it is being proceed.

We will let you know the result as soon as possible. Meanwhile, if you have any questions, please contact our customer service.

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: WithdrawalRequestedSms
WithdrawalRequestReleasedEmail
data.value:
{ "MessageType": "WithdrawalRequestReleased", "MessageDeliveryMethod": "Email", "TemplateName": "Withdrawal Request Released", "Subject": "{{model.BrandName}} Withdrawal request {{model.ReferenceCode}} : Approved", "MessageContent": "

Hi {{model.FirstName}},

Your withdrawal request {{model.ReferenceCode}} is approved. We have deposited {{model.Amount}} to your bank account, please check.

Please call our Customer Support if you have any questions, we are always here to help!

Cheers.

The {{model.BrandName}} team.

" }

data.name: WithdrawalRequestReleasedSms
